Articles.Content:
Build: 1.0.2

Os: Windows 8 64bit, Nvidia GeForce GTX 770, 16gb ram

Problem: Every time I take the first vessel contract I get stuck with it, I've launched 2 vessels already and it is still not completed. Happens no matter how many times I restart/create a new game. 

Note: Not above save game modding.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-21T23:33:06Z" title="06/21/2015 11:33  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 21, 2015</time> by locustgate**
Same here, that one just won't complete. I can complete it using Alt-F12, but then it still sits in the inactive contract list.
